long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spymaster Helper is the ultimate companion for the online game Codenames. Designed to give Spymasters an edge, this extension automates the tedious task of extracting words, colors, and positions from the game board. It enables Spymasters to quickly analyze the board and generate strategic clues to lead their team to victory. With a user-friendly interface and seamless integration with the game, Spymaster Helper makes it easy to stay on top of your game, ensuring you never miss a crucial detail. Whether you’re playing casually with friends or competing in high-stakes matches, Spymaster Helper is the tool you need to outsmart your opponents and dominate the game.
